name: Bengkel Gizi
description:
Bengkel Gizi

Bengkel Gizi is a 2D puzzle game that focuses on balanced nutrition. Players can serve food to customers according to their desired needs. There are five types of nutrients that customers can request with five variations of food for each nutrient that customers can order. Players must serve the right food so that customers do not run away.The goal of this game is to serve all customers who come every day.
